Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_GetDimPoolHeader]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetDimPoolHeader] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetDimPoolHeader] @DimPoolID bigint, @LTVPassNo varchar(50) ='''''''' AS
Begin
declare @loanCount bigint declare @loanValue decimal(15,2)
set @loanCount = (select value from dbo.tblUIDataAggregation where AggregationCategory=''''Total'''' and AggregationItem = ''''LoanCount'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolID and LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo) set @loanValue = (select value from dbo.tblUIDataAggregation where AggregationCategory=''''Total'''' and AggregationItem = ''''CurrentPrincipalBalance'''' and DimPoolID = @DimPoolID and LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo)
Select * , @loanCount as ''''LoanCount'''', @loanValue as ''''LoanValue'''' From dbo.tblDimPool Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolID
End ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
